text: The Interview is a 2014 American political action comedy movie directed by Seth Rogen and Evan Goldberg. It stars James Franco, Seth Rogen, Lizzy Caplan, and Randall Park. Seth Rogen and James Franco star as journalists who set up an interview with North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un (Randall Park), and are then recruited by the CIA to assassinate him. It was set to be released on December 25, 2014, but the movie was not released in cinemas due to threats from North Korea. The movie was released on demand and on YouTube. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2014 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:Movies set in North Korea Category:Movies set in South Korea Category:Movies about dictators Category:Movies about assassinations
title: The Interview (2014 movie)
